name: Akatsuki
startIntroPart2: The world must know the pain to acknowledge peace!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be destroyed!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? Our organization will take care of them.
introduction: As superior universe entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
